examplePhrases: Alexa ask space facts for a fact
Alexa tell space facts to tell me trivia
en-US.name: Space Facts
en-US.description:
Ask for Space Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Space Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Space Facts" or "Alexa, open Space Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

en-GB.summary: Listen to My Radio, less bla bla bla, more la la la.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask My Radio to play
en-GB.name: My Radio
en-GB.description:
Listen to My Radio, with less bla bla bla, and more la la la.

My Radio provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch My Radio" or "Alexa, play my radio" to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"
